stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you reveal the grip with a subroutine on this ice, you may trash 1 revealed card of that type. Subroutine Reveal the grip. Subroutine Reveal the grip. Errata from CR 1.4
text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you reveal the grip with a subroutine on this ice, you may trash 1 revealed card of that type.
[subroutine] Reveal the grip.
[subroutine] Reveal the grip.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
title: Engram Flush
